snippet: The rejection comes amid rising tensions between foreign news organizations and the Chinese government, which has been using various means to express displeasure with coverage it deems unflattering.
abstract: Chinese government rejects visa application of Paul Mooney, veteran American journalist who was to begin reporting there for Thomson Reuters; rejection comes amid rising tensions between foreign news organizations and Chinese government, which has been using various means to express displeasure with coverage it deems unflattering.
lead_paragraph: The rejection comes amid rising tensions between foreign news organizations and the Chinese government, which has been using various means to express displeasure with coverage it deems unflattering.

headline.main: Reporter for Reuters Won’t Receive China Visa
headline.print_headline: Reporter For Reuters Won’t Receive China Visa
